name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
The Xiong'an New Area Management Committee is recruiting outstanding graduates at a school job fair
The recruitment notice shows that qualified talents will receive generous treatment and can apply for the "Xiong'an Xiongcai Card", enjoy national high-speed rail and airport VIP services, well-known experts registration appointments, free city transportation and other benefits, and cardholders and their spouses and children can apply for Xiong'an household registration.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At noon on April 18, 2023, a fire broke out in the inpatient department of Beijing Changfeng Hospital, killing 21 people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On April 14, a student from Luohe High School in Henan Province chose to jump off a building to end his life.
In his suicide note, he wrote:
"After I leave, they will give you less homework and more rest. This is not because they have a change of heart, nor because they have become good people, but because I have been here... The grand narrative is dead, I just want to live an ordinary life... I will always love Amano Haruna"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 18, the first instance verdict of the "1.11" BMW crash case in Tianhe, Guangdong was announced.
The defendant Wen Qingyun was sentenced to death and deprived of political rights for life.

At 17:00 on January 11, 2023, Wen Qingyun drove a BMW car and maliciously crashed into the crowd in the area of Tianhe Road, Tiyu East Road, and Tianhe South Second Road in Tianhe District, Guangzhou City, Guangdong Province, China, resulting in 5 deaths and 13 injuries.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On the evening of April 18, a malicious crash occurred at Chongqing Wanzhou Music Square
A black car rushed towards an open-air food stall and was then stopped and subdued by the public.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens added

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Here, I strongly urge everyone not to give up life easily. Suicide cannot solve the problem. On the contrary, it will bring irreparable harm and pain to yourself and the people around you. Any pressure is only temporary. If you feel depressed, helpless, and desperate, you can try to talk to your friends, psychologists, and anyone you trust. Please realize that life is precious and don't give up easily.

content:
Netizen contribution
On April 18, the famous fairy tale writer Zheng Yuanjie published a farewell letter, saying that because of the difficulty of defending his rights and the admonition of the Trademark Office of the State Intellectual Property Office, he would stop defending his rights and publishing his works.

On the evening of April 18, a knife murder occurred in Hunan Village, Yichuan County, Luoyang, Henan Province. A man killed his mother, sister and four-year-old daughter.

Southeast University conducts 2023 Jiangsu University Network Commentary Training and Practical Competition Exercise.
Southeast University is one of the top universities in China, a double first-class A-level university and a key university of the former 985 Project and the former 211 Project.

On the morning of April 19, in Sishui County, Shandong Province, a large truck suddenly lost control and crashed into an opposite truck. According to the contributor, the accident caused 13 deaths.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
It is reported that a stabbing incident occurred at the north gate of Shandong University of Science and Technology this afternoon.
It is said that a student came back to take revenge on the school after being expelled.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Subsequent update
The teacher of Shanxi University of Science and Technology responded that the person has been controlled.
The police of Xinan Police Station in Huangdao District said that they had no comment and would report in a few days.
